sense.def:
Fuss
so skrbi ali vznemirjenje brez potrebe.

seg.quote: They're making a fuss about the wedding.
He accepted the statement without fuss.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
fuss
, jih po nepotrebnem skrbi ali se vznemirjajo za prazen nič.

cit.quote: nergati, delati hrup za prazen nič

sense.def:
To make a fuss of someone
pomeni nekomu posvečati veliko pozornosti.

seg.quote: They like to be flattered and made a fuss of.

sense.def:
To fuss over someone or something
pomeni nekomu ali nečemu posvečati preveč pozornosti ali biti preveč v skrbeh zanj.

seg.quote: She was inclined to fuss over her health.
